product_name: REI Water Reversible Hat - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The REI Water Reversible hat delivers 2 looks in 1! Young boys can choose from solid or print depending on their outfit or mood. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Lightweight and collapsible, this hat provides easy packability for quickly stowing in a pocket or purse. Polyester shell is soft, breathable and quick drying. Pocket on side crown keeps tiny treasures secure.
short_description: The REI Water Reversible hat delivers 2 looks in 1! Young boys can choose from solid or print depending on their outfit or mood.
